author: mbk
msg: Spelling fix (issue 1123), noticed by the sharp eyes of Andriy Palamarchuk.

author: philip
msg: Fix issue 1122, recognise "/" and "/foo" as parent-child.

author: philip
msg: Fix a case of using pool memory after a clear, tracked down with
valgrind.  This was causing switch_tests.py 2, 4 and 6 to fail,
when run over ra_svn with APR pool debugging enabled.

author: mbk
msg: Update the documentation of the fs structure to describe the new UUID
table.  Thanks go to Karl Fogel for the review that prompted this update.
Describe the UUID table's semantics, syntax, and lexical structure.

author: mmacek
msg: Replace calls to svn_stream_from_stdio with svn_stream_from_aprfile.
